Articles.Content:
The contract has two parts:

1) Save Cery Kerman

2) Recover Cery Kerman on Kerbin

The first part of the contract was completed, and it said Cery was added to the astronaut complex. I deorbited my ship and landed on Kerbin, but Cery wasn't on it, even though I saved her. I think it's important to note that somehow she was inside of a Stayputnik. I couldn't EVA her because it said "there is no hatch to exit"...

Help?

Mods:

Asteroid Day

CRP

DMagic Orbital Science

KerbalGPS

kOS

MechJeb

RealChute

USI

It's a bug with USI, which has been fixed in the latest version. However since you already have the mission I don't think it will fix it. You'll need to edit the save file to change the part with Cery inside to something with a hatch.
